name: Hatsuyume
skill: A high/very high chance of inflicting Stun to all enemies.
ability: Slightly reduces DMG received for all melee allies.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the first dream of the New Year. She spends nearly the entire day sleeping, and even when she's awake, she's so out of it, there's no talking to her. The first dream of the New Year that she shows you has the mysterious power to change your fate. This is accomplished mainly by the efforts of "The Three Fortunes," spirits who support New Year Dream in her endeavors, and their every activity apparently energizes her.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 24/12/16 - 06/01/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 25 Mochi 06/01/17 - 11/01/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 06/01/17
◦ Can only be exchanged once
